Changed from /api/projects/:id/books to /api/books/project/:id to match

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Use active version for chapter queries across all services

Add version-aware chapter queries to ensure only the active version''s
chapters are used for word counts, analytics, progress tracking, and
all other operations. This prevents incorrect data when multiple
versions exist \(e.g., during rewrites\).

- analytics.ts: Filter book analysis by active version
- chapters.ts: Create chapters with version_id, auto-create Version 1
- completion.ts: Await async checkBookCompletion calls
- outlines.ts: Delete chapters from active version only
- projects.ts: Filter chapter count by active version
- trilogy.ts: Await async generateSeriesBible call
- chapter-orchestrator.service.ts: Filter stats by active version
- completion-detection.service.ts: Check completion for active version
- cross-book-continuity.service.ts: Get last chapter from active version
- progress-tracking.service.ts: Calculate progress from active version
- series-bible-generator.service.ts: Aggregate timeline from active version
- veb.service.ts: Filter all chapter queries by active version

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Handle proseStyle object display in edit-story page

The proseStyle field from story_dna can be either a string or an object
with detailed properties \(sentenceStructure, vocabularyLevel, etc.\).
When it''s an object, convert it to a readable string format instead of
displaying "[object Object]".

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
